\subsection{Detailed Description}
This class contains a number of methods used to work with the \hyperlink{classg_form}{g\-Form} class to assist in presentation and validation of forms. This separate file was created to keep the class file clean. Needless to say, this file needs to be called as an include in the same file which includes the main class.

function will validate e-\/mail addresses implement this function as 'Mail\-Val(\$\-Addr, \$\-Level)'

\begin{DoxyRefDesc}{Todo}
\item[\hyperlink{todo__todo000011}{Todo}]this function is old. T\-L\-Ds and C\-Cs may be out of date.\end{DoxyRefDesc}
